directory.name: components
directory.purpose: This directory, `src\components`, houses reusable UI components for a todo application, including input, item display, filtering, and statistics.

subdirectories.name: TodoApp
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoApp` directory contains the source code components for a Todo application.

subdirectories.name: TodoFilters
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoFilters` directory contains the source code for the components responsible for filtering todo items within a larger application.

subdirectories.name: TodoInput
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoInput` directory contains the source code for the components responsible for user input within a todo application.

subdirectories.name: TodoItem
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\components\TodoItem` directory contains the source code for the individual "TodoItem" component within a larger application.

subdirectories.name: TodoList
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoList` directory contains the source code components for a to-do list feature within a larger software project.

subdirectories.name: TodoStats
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `TodoStats` directory contains the source code for the components responsible for displaying statistics related to a to-do list application.
